thread.title_full: Ground News - DeSantis knocks Haley over Civil War remarks: ‘Incomprehensible word salad’

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - DeSantis knocks Haley over Civil War remarks: ‘Incomprehensible word salad’
text:
Summary by Ground News Nikki Haley said the Civil War was simply about the freedoms of what people could and couldn't do. Ron DeSantis said it was not that difficult to identify and acknowledge the role slavery played in the civil war. Haley has been doing damage control on her comments the night before. Share menu More
Filters 2 Articles 2 Articles All Left Center Right
The Hill Center High Factuality Media Conglomerate: Nexstar Media Group DeSantis knocks Haley over Civil War remarks: ‘Incomprehensible word salad’ Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis (R) went after fellow GOP candidate Nikki Haley on Thursday over her remarks failing to acknowledge slavery as the cause of the Civil War. The Florida governor told reporters in Iowa that Haley’s explanation for the Civil War was “incomprehensible word salad” and called her “not a candidate that’s ready for…
